term.title: quantum mechanics/molecular mechanics

item.text: Hybrid procedure for the treatment of large molecular systems. A crucial part of the system (e.g., the chromophore and its surroundings) is treated explicitly by quantum mechanical (QM) techniques, whereas the rest of the system is approximated by a classical or molecular mechanics (MM) force field treatment.
